pr_title: global update of doi:mdcbaseurlstring and doi.baseurlstringnext

timeline.message:
global update of doi:mdcbaseurlstring and doi.baseurlstringnext

to doi.dataciterestapiurlstring
rename release note file so I update at release time

timeline.bodyText: So this API endpoint only supports DataCite?
timeline.author: sekmiller

replies.bodyText: Good catch. Yes, and I think the docs say that. However, the other places that were DataCite-specific had been resolved in earlier PRs that were merged into dev. I just resolved the conflicts in this PR and you can see DoiDataCiteServiceBean now gets the new URL via the SystemConfig method and the DeletePIDCommand is no longer DataCite specific.
replies.author: qqmyers

timeline.bodyText: Again, surprised that this command only supports DataCite, but it was like this previously.
timeline.author: sekmiller

timeline.message:
Merge remote-tracking branch 'IQSS/develop' into IQSS/7113

-consolidate_datacite_jvm_options

Conflicts:
	src/main/java/edu/harvard/iq/dataverse/DOIDataCiteServiceBean.java
	src/main/java/edu/harvard/iq/dataverse/engine/command/impl/DeletePidCommand.java
